summary.span: 提供緩衝區，允許後援處理常式在無法編碼輸入字元時，將替代字串傳回至編碼器。

span.span: Provides a buffer that allows a fallback handler to return an alternate string to an encoder when it cannot encode an input character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編碼方式定義的 Unicode 字元與編碼的位元組序列之間的對應。An encoding defines a mapping between a Unicode character and an encoded sequence of bytes. 如果未定義對應的特定字元，編碼作業，它會將輸入的字元轉換成輸出位元組序列，將會失敗。An encoding operation, which converts an input character to an output byte sequence, fails if no mapping is defined for a particular character. .NET Framework 會提供失敗處理機制，稱為後援，如果無法執行轉換。The .NET Framework provides a failure handling mechanism, called a fallback, if a conversion cannot be performed. 所有的編碼器後援處理常式必須實作下列各項：All encoder fallback handlers must implement the following: - 編碼器後援，表示由類別衍生自類別。An encoder fallback, which is represented by a class derived from the class. - 編碼器後援緩衝區，衍生的類型由可以傳回字串，轉換作業的類別。An encoder fallback buffer, which is represented by a type derived from the class that can return a string to the conversion operation. 後援可以使用三種策略來處理轉換失敗：Fallbacks can use three strategies to handle conversion failures: - 自動調整的對應。Best-fit mapping. 編碼器後援緩衝區可以傳回字串，表示輸入的字元最接近的近似值。The encoder fallback buffer can return a string that represents a close approximation to the input character. .NET Framework 不會提供自動調整的公用實作。The .NET Framework does not provide a public best-fit implementation. - 取代。Replacement. 編碼器後援緩衝區可以傳回的字串，例如問號 ("？")，指出無法編碼的字元。The encoder fallback buffer can return a string, such as a question mark ("?"), that indicates that a character could not be encoded. 在.NET Framework 中，和類別提供公用取代後援緩衝區實作。In the .NET Framework, the and classes provide a public replacement fallback buffer implementation. 建構函式類別可讓您定義取代字串。The constructor of the class enables you to define the replacement string. - 例外狀況。Exception. 實作會擲回的例外狀況，指出無法編碼字元，並終止編碼作業。The implementation throws an exception, which indicates that a character cannot be encoded, and terminates the encoding operation. 在此情況下，後援處理常式必須提供實作中，雖然它不會傳回字串給編碼器。In this case, the fallback handler must provide an implementation, although it does not return a string to the encoder. 在.NET Framework 中，並類別會提供一個公用例外狀況後援實作，會擲回無法編碼字元時。In the .NET Framework, the and classes provide a public exception fallback implementation that throws an when a character cannot be encoded. 在緩衝區實作代表要傳回至編碼器的回應中的編碼器後援的整個字串。The buffer in an implementation represents the entire string to be returned to the encoder in response to an encoder fallback. 一般而言，實作也會包含狀態資訊，例如若要返回編碼器和剩餘的字元數，傳回的下一個字元的索引。Generally, implementations also include state information, such as the index of the next character to return to the encoder and the number of remaining characters to be returned. 因為是抽象類別，它需要衍生的類別實作最少的下列成員：Because is an abstract class, it requires derived classes to implement the following members at a minimum: - 多載方法，編碼器在無法編碼字元時呼叫。The overloaded method, which is called by the encoder when it cannot encode a character. 編碼器會將兩項資訊傳遞至後援緩衝區實作： 字元或無法編碼的 surrogate 字組和索引中輸入的字元。The encoder passes two pieces of information to the fallback buffer implementation: the character or surrogate pair that could not be encoded and the index of the character in the input. 編碼器後援例外狀況處理常式，在這個方法是擲回例外狀況。In an encoder fallback exception handler, the exception is thrown in this method. 否則，方法會傳回`true`提供後援或`false`則。Otherwise, the method returns `true` if it provides a fallback, or `false` if it does not. - 方法，如果會重複呼叫編碼器方法會傳回`true`。The method, which is called repeatedly by the encoder if the method returns `true`. 在後續呼叫中，處理常式應該會傳回在其緩衝區中的每個字元。In successive calls, the handler should return each character in its buffer. 當它已傳回的所有字元時，它應傳回 u+0000。When it has returned all characters, it should return U+0000. 例外狀況處理常式一律會傳回 u+0000。An exception handler always returns U+0000. - 方法，它會嘗試將指標移至緩衝區中的前一個位置，並指出移動是否成功。The method, which tries to move the pointer to the previous position in the buffer and indicates whether the move was successful. 例外狀況處理常式一律會傳回`false`。An exception handler always returns `false`. - 屬性，指出要傳回至編碼器的剩餘字元數。The property, which indicates the number of remaining characters to be returned to the encoder. 例外狀況後援處理常式一律會傳回零。An exception fallback handler always returns zero.
